text: Andriy Arpadovych Shandor (Ukrainian: Андрій Арпадович Шандор, born 5 January 1966 in Lviv, Ukraine) is a former Ukrainian professional football referee.Profile He has been a full international for FIFA since 2002.FIFA. title: Andriy Shandor
